description: A bright  and spacious Townhome in one of Port Moody's best neighbourhoods. Welcome to this beautifully updated 3 bed, 3 bath, 1431 sq ft. home. The layout is ideal with and open floor plan on the main floor and 3 generous sized bedrooms upstairs. Upgrades include engineered hardwood floors, pot lights, smart thermostats, blackout shades, and a new turf front yard. The kitchen features a new fridge, microwave, and dishwasher. Comfort is enhanced by a HEAT PUMP and new hot water tank. Enjoy resort-style amenities at the Canoe Club with an outdoor pool, sauna, steam room, and community room. Steps from Port Moody’s breweries, shops, parks, and SkyTrain. This home offers a turnkey lifestyle in one of the city’s most desirable communities.
